text: The 2018 FIBA U20 Women's European Championship was the 17th edition of the Women's U-20 European basketball championship. 16 teams participated in the competition, which was played in Sopron, Hungary, from 7 to 15 July 2018. ==Venues== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- | rowspan=8| !Sopron |- |Novomatic Arena Sopron |- |Capacity: 2,000 |} ==Participating teams== * * (3rd place, 2017 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship for Women Division B) * * (Winners, 2017 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship for Women Division B) * * * * * * * * * (Runners-up, 2017 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship for Women Division B) * * * ==Preliminary round== In this round, the 16 teams are allocated in four groups of four teams each. All teams advance to the playoff round of 16.Competition system ===Group A=== \---- ===Group B=== \---- ===Group C=== \---- ===Group D=== \---- ==Knockout stage== ===Bracket=== ;5–8th place bracket ;9–16th place bracket ;13–16th place bracket ===Final=== ==Final standings== {| class="infobox bordered" |- | style="background: #ffcccc; width:22px;" | |Team relegated to 2019 European U-20 Division B |} {|class=wikitable style="text-align:center;" |- !Rank !!width=200|Team !!
